transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Haan sir, IndiaMART-le irundhu pesikittirukken sir.
Executive: Haan sollunga sir.
Customer: Haan sir adhaan sir. Morning koopidraangara avanga pesirundhaanga regarding service pathi. Adhu vandhu avanga rendu unga rendu per interaction sariya pogala appidingarana not satisfied ingaradhumaari koduthirukkeenga. Adhu avanga name-la oru complaint maari raise pannirukkeenga. Adhaavadhu internal ticket raise aayirukku. So adhaan enna thappa pesi irukkeenga.
Executive: Eppadi sir problem sir?
Customer: Sujith, Sujithra andha avana pesinaanga.
Executive: Sujithra pesirukkeengala? Okay okay. Appathaan Sujithra ingara name-le tag aayirukku. Okay okay. Enna sollirundhaanga sir edhaavadhu wrong-aa pesitaangala?
Customer: Illa sir edhaavadhu wrong-aa pesala. Aana sonnadhe thirumba thirumba sollittirundhaanga.
Executive: Okay. Sonnadhe thirumba thirumba pesitaangala? Already mention pannadhe irukkenave sonnadhe thaan thirumba thirumba pesitaanga.
Executive: I mean idhukku munnadi kodutha instruction-ne thirumba thirumba sollittu irundhaanga.
Customer: Haan andha instruction thirumba thirumba kodukraanga. Enakku time waste aagudhu. Adhanaala thaan call pannen.
Executive: Puriyudhu puriyudhu sir. Okay sir naan onnu pannren. Idhukku appuram like edhaavadhu irundhaalum unga kitta WhatsApp-le text panna sollaren. Endha oru pudhu update irundhaalum. Like the same thing-ga vandhu repeat pannama avanga kitta naan pesi okka idhu pannren. Ippa adhu thaan vandhu oru concern-aa raise aayirukku ingara. So with your permission avanga name-le adhu complaint irukradha naan close pannalaama? Like edhaavadhu wrong-aa pesirukkaanga appidinaa we are ready to take action also.
Customer: Illa illa close pannirunga sir appallam onnum problem illa.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you sir. Feedback mattum varum.
Customer: Hmm okay sir.
Executive: So mail-le feedback mattum varum. Adhu mattum konjam paathukonga.
Customer: Like avanga mela idhuva irukku.
Executive: Understand sir. Illa ippa close pannren. Close pannadhukku appuram oru five minutes-kulla vandhurum sir.
Customer: Okay sir. Thank you sir. Thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive repeated instructions.

- Customer's time was being wasted.



Resolution:

- Executive assured no repeat of instructions.

- Complaint against the executive will be closed.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive feedback form in mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, feedback, instructions, resolution
